caption: Just received a mixed case of Carpe Vino from a friend as a gift. Had family over for the weekend, the Rose and Chardonnay were a huge hit.  Great job by the Winemaker.

Tried 2 different wines and 1 beer on my first time here and everything tasted amazing, and made new friends while the world was quarantined. Who can complain about a $18 bottle of wine on a Friday night?! Owner is super nice. Nothing to complain about here. Enjoy the romance!

A great addition to the neighborhood! Their wines are incredible and they have not only their Carpe Vino Wines but also NY based beer and wine. Josh knows so much about every product  and is delightful to talk to. Amazing experience. Will definitely be back.
Very kind and welcoming owner offering good NY wine (plus beer and cider) at reasonable prices! Try the Cabernet Franc

This is definitely a go to place if you are looking to really have some fun in a relaxed atmosphere. A lot of wine and beer experience here . The Staff are so inviting and you are sure to have a great experience. Enjoy

These guys have really turned this space into a beautiful, cozy tasting room and bar. They have an excellent selection of house-branded wine made out in LI, and other NYS wines as well as a few beers on tap too. The prices are reasonable and the wine is excellent! You can buy bottles to go, which is a nice touch. Carpé Vino fills the wine bar hole this neighborhood has had for a few years now, and I’m looking forward to becoming a regular here.
